scripts.test: npm install && npx cypress run --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=results,overwrite=false,html=false,json=true
scripts.generate-merge-report-windows: npx mochawesome-merge 'results/*.json' > mochawesome.json  && npx marge mochawesome.json -o reports/%DATE:~10,4%%DATE:~4,2%%DATE:~7,2%_%TIME:~0,2%%TIME:~3,2%%TIME:~6,2% -t report -p test-report
scripts.generate-merge-report-ubuntu: npx mochawesome-merge 'results/*.json' > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json -o reports/$(date +'%Y%m%d_%H%M%S') -t report -p test-report
